languages.text: "Жаль, Махарий этого не слышит". {n}На сжатых губах Иокасты проглядывает желчная улыбка.{/n} "Он всегда слишком много о себе думал, но вы видите его насквозь, Лорд-капитан".
"Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Жаль, Махарий этого не слышит". {n}На сжатых губах Иокасты проглядывает желчная улыбка.{/n} "Он всегда слишком много о себе думал, но вы видите его насквозь, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Too bad Macharius cannot hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

"Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « Dommage que Macharius ne soit pas là pour entendre ça, {n}commente Jocasta avec un sourire amer.{/n} Il a toujours eu la plus haute opinion de sa personne, mais je constate que vous avez vu clair dans son jeu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Dommage que Macharius ne soit pas là pour entendre ça, {n}commente Jocasta avec un sourire amer.{/n} Il a toujours eu la plus haute opinion de sa personne, mais je constate que vous avez vu clair dans son jeu, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}. »

languages.text: «Es una lástima que Macharius no pueda oír eso». {n}Una sonrisa mordaz retuerce los labios apretados de Jocasta.{/n} «Siempre se ha tenido en muy alta estima, pero usted lo ve tal y como es, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «Es una lástima que Macharius no pueda oír eso». {n}Una sonrisa mordaz retuerce los labios apretados de Jocasta.{/n} «Siempre se ha tenido en muy alta estima, pero usted lo ve tal y como es, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: “可惜马卡里乌斯听不到这句话。”{n}约卡斯塔紧绷的嘴角露出了尖刻的微笑。{/n}“他这个人一向自视甚高，但您却把他看得明明白白，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “可惜马卡里乌斯听不到这句话。”{n}约卡斯塔紧绷的嘴角露出了尖刻的微笑。{/n}“他这个人一向自视甚高，但您却把他看得明明白白，舰长大人。”

languages.text: 「マカリウスが聞こえなかったのは残念です。」{n}ジョカスタは険しい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「彼はいつも自分を高く評価していますが、あなたは彼をお見通しですね、ロード・キャプテン
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「マカリウスが聞こえなかったのは残念だ。」{n}ジョカスタは険しい笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「彼はいつも自分を高く評価しているが、あなたは彼をお見通しですね、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Ein Jammer, dass Macharius das nicht gehört hat." {n}Ein bitteres Lächeln verzerrt Jocastas zusammengepresste Lippen.{/n} "Er hat immer sehr viel auf sich gehalten, doch Ihr durchschaut ihn, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Ein Jammer, dass Macharius das nicht gehört hat." {n}Ein bitteres Lächeln verzerrt Jocastas zusammengepresste Lippen.{/n} "Er hat immer sehr viel auf sich gehalten, doch Ihr durchschaut ihn, Lord Captain."

languages.text: "Macharius'un bunu duymamış olması çok yazık." {n}Jocasta'nın sıkı dudaklarında alaycı bir gülümseme meydana geliyor.{/n} "Kendisini her zaman çok yüksekte görmüştür ama siz onun nasıl biri olduğunu anlamışsınız Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "Too bad Macharius could not hear that." {n}An acrimonious smile twists Jocasta's pressed lips.{/n} "He has always thought very highly of himself, but you see right through him, Lord Captain."
